tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Dental X-Ray,
review: I visited the clinic on getting a fractured molar. I was administered a root canal treatment with Zirconia crown. What I liked most about Maxx dental was the professionalism - be it timeliness in appointments, follow-up or clarity in communicating the problem and possible solution options. The doctors and staff are friendly and courteous, and the procedures are done by numerous experts in the field, some in-house and others brought in as needed. They come across as a premium service provider, and are easily available on call for any doubts/clarifications in between appointments/sittings. Overall... a very good experience. My parents, wife and brother's family have also got treatments done here at Maxx Dental and are happy with the experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** ** *** **** ******** * **** ***** Dr Durgha and her team managed to preserve my damaged tooth, which was written off by other dentist. I had very limited time to complete the full process, Dr Durgha arranged everything professionally and completed everything within a week to fit in my timescale.  The quality of the service is top class. Dr Durgha inspected at every stage to ensure the quality.  
Strongly recommend Maxx for a quality timely service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I recently visited Maxx Dental Care for dental cleaning and fluoride therapy. The doctors were very friendly and took the time to explain each step of the process before proceeding with the treatment. They made me feel comfortable throughout the entire visit. Their regular follow-ups, post-treatment show true dedication to patient care. I highly recommend this clinic! Thank you, doctors!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Personally I loved my experience as an Ortho patient! I got my braces for 8 months as informed by my doctor Durga, and she completely delivered her promise with a beautifully aligned teeth in 8 months! The clinic is also very cozy and makes us feel comfortable throughout the journey and regular checkups were always a priority from their side! Truly recommend ‚ú®

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Would like to thanks Dr Durga for her patience and perseverance towards patient care. 
She is very detail oriented and explained the questions very patiently and ensured our doubts were cleared before she started every procedure

Her friendly attitude helped my Son to be less anxious and she continuously motivated him to wiggle through the discomfort and helped him to complete the course with little over a year..

During the initial days my Son broke few braces and we have to meet her often to get it fixed. She was polite and helped my son to fix his braces


Her office is very welcoming and clean 

Having seen the quality of the work in a timely fashion I would strongly recommend her to any kids who needs braces
reply_text: Thank you very much for your kind words of appreciation sir

reply_text: Thank you sir for your valuable appreciation. Thank you for choosing us for your dental needs.

reply_text: Thank you soo much Atharva for your words of appreciation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Visited For Open Bite. Braces

************** Responsible. Deft. Brilliant.
You run for adjectives when you're a more than happy, content patient. I had quite a big open bite. It was opined that I might have a tooth or two removed and serious still, that only surgery might help my cause. It was then Dr. Nivetha of Radiant Dental at Perungudi introduced me to Dr. Durgha. Dr. Durgha was not only clear that they were uncalled for but also firmly knew what needs to be done precisely. Over the course, she let me understand each set of processes and what the desired effect of it would be. By realising what the doctor is trying to do, you are encouraged to follow her instructions diligently. So I was eager to see the progress in each visit. She anticipates results, favourable or otherwise, has alternatives too and thus directs accordingly- a modus operandi any professional would love to bear. By the virtue of all these, Dr. Durgha has a part in my 'aesthetic' smile now. Thank you, doctor.

P. S: Radiant is a definite go too. Other doctors and sisters are thoroughly equipped as well. Thanks to a very amicable team
reply_text: Thank u soo very much for ur kind words sir .. keeps drs like me encouraged :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: During first visit doctor has checked for any signs of decay through X-rays, and provided professional cleaning. Doctor clearly mentioned the process of my treatment, time taken to complete the braces and also handled the process smoothly, they also offered valuable advice on oral hygiene practices and answered any questions I had. Overall, it was a positive experience, and I left feeling confident about my dental health and Smile üòÅ

review: After reading all velachery clinic google reviews I decided to go Maxx dental for tooth cleaning and sensitivity in one of my teeth. Got to know 4 teeths were infected during the consultation. Dr Durgha explained well about the procedure which makes believe in them to just go with the treatment. One of my teeth got over reacted after the treatment, but they did follow up for a month until its completely cured and all my tooth sensitive issues have gone, thanks to Dr. They treat their patients with care, and i just admire the way they explain the pros and cons. Very professional and dedicated. 100% satisfied, HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got myself into a year and half long braces treatment for correction of closed bite or cross bite. I am about 36 years old and I took it this treatment as I faced incomplete biting and chewing issues and there was also a distinct possibility of losing my lower teeth. I must admit that, if it was not for the persistence and hard work of the doctor, I would not have completed the treatment.  I would like to thank her by saying few words on the treatment she provided to me. She had always kept my best interest in mind and she provided the best possible treatment to me, even going out of her way.  She had always provided appointments to me even during pandemic times, some of the times she had to travel to clinic only to attend me as I was visiting her from outstation. I had paid my entire fees during the first three months of the treatment, when I wanted to prematurely discontinue the treatment due to repeated breakages in wire, she could have simply acceded without any financial impact, however she continued to treat me with great care for over an year and half to successfully treat me. I am thankful to her and I wish her a long and illustrious career.
reply_text: Thank u for ur kind words ..  :)
